column1: products.  As  per  the  submissions  made,  the  main  shareholder  is  Fonterra  Brands
Singapore (Pvt) Limited. According to the written submissions of the Respondent the
ultimate parent entity of the entire group is the Fonterra Co-Operative Group of New
Zealand  (herein  referred  to  as  “FCG”).  The  Respondent  had  entered  into  a  licence
agreement with another company, New Zealand Milk Brands Limited (herein referred
to  as  “NZMB”).  However,  it  is  the  contention  of  the  Appellant  that  NZMB  has
Respondent to remit royalties to FCG. This is also borne out by the letter of intimation
found on page 51 of the brief. This contention was never challenged by the Respondent
but in fact was admitted by the Respondent.
